languages.text: {n}Ирлиэт смотрит почти сочувственно.{/n} "Единственное спасение, что ты можешь подарить несчастным — это милость прервать их страдания".
{n}Yrliet looks almost sympathetically.{/n} "The only salvation you can give to the unfortunate is the grace to end their suffering."
languages.original_text: {n}Ирлиэт смотрит почти сочувственно.{/n} "Единственное спасение, что ты можешь подарить несчастным — это милость прервать их страдания".

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet looks almost sympathetically.{/n} "The only salvation you can give to the unfortunate is the grace to end their suffering."
{n}Yrliet looks almost sympathetically.{/n} "The only salvation you can give to the unfortunate is the grace to end their suffering."

{n}Yrliet looks almost sympathetically.{/n} "The only salvation you can give to the unfortunate is the grace to end their suffering."
{n}Yrliet looks almost sympathetically.{/n} "The only salvation you can give to the unfortunate is the grace to end their suffering."

languages.text: {n}Yrliet lui adresse un regard presque compatissant.{/n} « Il n'y a rien à faire pour les aider, hormis peut-être abréger leurs souffrances. »
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet looks almost sympathetically.{/n} "The only salvation you can give to the unfortunate is the grace to end their suffering."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet lui adresse un regard presque compatissant.{/n} « Il n'y a rien à faire pour les aider, hormis peut-être abréger leurs souffrances. »

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特带着几近同情的目光看着阿洁塔。{/n}“这些不幸之人唯一的拯救，就是彻底结束他们的痛苦。”
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet looks almost sympathetically.{/n} "The only salvation you can give to the unfortunate is the grace to end their suffering."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特带着几近同情的目光看着阿洁塔。{/n}“这些不幸之人唯一的拯救，就是彻底结束他们的痛苦。”

languages.text: {n}ユリエットは同情するような表情を浮かべた。{/n}「この不運な者たちに、あなたが与えることのできる唯一の救いは、彼らの苦しみを終わらせることだろう」
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet looks almost sympathetically.{/n} "The only salvation you can give to the unfortunate is the grace to end their suffering."

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットは同情するような表情を浮かべた。{/n}「この不運な者たちに、あなたが与えることのできる唯一の救いは、彼らの苦しみを終わらせることだろう」

languages.text: {n}Yrliet schaut fast wohlwollend.{/n} "Die einzige Erlösung für diese Unglücklichen wäre der Tod, der nur er beendet ihr Leiden."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet looks almost sympathetically.{/n} "The only salvation you can give to the unfortunate is the grace to end their suffering."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet schaut fast wohlwollend.{/n} "Die einzige Erlösung für diese Unglücklichen wäre der Tod, der nur er beendet ihr Leiden."

languages.text: {n}Yrliet la mira casi con compasión.{/n} «La única salvación que puedes ofrecer a esos desdichados es la misericordia de terminar con su sufrimiento».
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet looks almost sympathetically.{/n} "The only salvation you can give to the unfortunate is the grace to end their suffering."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet la mira casi con compasión.{/n} «La única salvación que puedes ofrecer a esos desdichados es la misericordia de terminar con su sufrimiento».

languages.text: {n}Yrliet'in yumuşayan bakışlarından âdeta sempati akıyor.{/n} "Bu bahtsızları kurtarmanın tek yolu, merhamet edip ıstıraplarına son vermektir."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet looks almost sympathetically.{/n} "The only salvation you can give to the unfortunate is the grace to end their suffering."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet'in bakışları yumuşuyor, bakışlarından sempati akıyor resmen.{/n} "Bu bahtsızları kurtarmanın tek yolu, merhamet edip ıstıraplarına son vermektir."
